recommendations.too_short: Content is too thin. Add more comprehensive information about the topic.
recommendations.insufficient: Content may not fully cover the topic. Consider expanding with more details.

recommendations.poor_structure: Improve content structure with shorter paragraphs and bullet points.
recommendations.complex: Content may be too complex. Simplify language for better readability.

recommendations.low_usage: Keywords appear too infrequently. Include them more naturally in content.
recommendations.stuffing: Possible keyword stuffing detected. Make keyword usage more natural.
